nodes.text: Master of the Order, or Mistress of the Order, also called the Master or Mistress of the Baran Do, was a title used to denote the leading Master of the Baran Do sages.

In 34 ABY, then-Jedi Knight Jacen Solo traveled to the Baran Do sages on Dorin. He was taught several Force techniques by their current Master of the Order, Koro Ziil. Around 43 ABY, Ziil joined the Hidden Ones, and by the time of the exiled Jedi Grand Master Luke Skywalker's visit later in the year, Tila Mong had become Mistress of the Order.
Known Masters and Mistresses of the Order
